```py
>>> df = pd.DataFrame(dict(A=[1, 1, 3], B=[None, 5, 6], C=[1, 2, 3],
...                        D=['3/11/2000', '3/12/2000', '3/13/2000']))
>>> df['D'] = pd.to_datetime(df['D'])
>>> df.groupby("A").first()
 B  C          D
A
1  5.0  1 2000-03-11
3  6.0  3 2000-03-13
>>> df.groupby("A").first(min_count=2)
 B    C          D
A
1 NaN  1.0 2000-03-11
3 NaN  NaN        NaT
>>> df.groupby("A").first(numeric_only=True)
 B  C
A
1  5.0  1
3  6.0  3 
```
